level.heading: ORIENTATION OF NEW AND REHIRED EMPLOYEES (ยง 14-7110)

level.text: The Authority will conduct an orientation program to introduce all new employees to their new positions and to the Authority.
Photo ID cards will be processed and issued by the Office of Human Resource Management.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 42 DCR 6914, 6922 (December 8, 1995).
